product_name: Giro Base Pockets Bike Shirt - Women's
long_description: Keep your cards, keys and mid-ride snacks within easy reach without having to wear a bike jersey. The women's Giro Base Pockets Bike Shirt is a body-hugging mesh layer that stows essentials. Polyester/elastin mesh wicks moisture and dries quickly, so you stay comfortable. Skeletal Pocket Construction(TM) reinforces seams with special structural tape so the 3 pockets don't sag under the weight of contents. Wear any shirt you want over the women's Giro Base Pockets Bike Shirt. Flat seams and a single-layer finished hem keep the shirt's profile low and your comfort level high.
